name: Memorial (thevinter)
description:
In the distant future there’s a machine that allows you to revive your memories. But sometimes people get stuck in them. It’s not easy to get out, and if you aren’t free in 72 hours then your brain dies.

You take the role of T, a Diver specialized in bringing out people from said loops. Will you be able to?

The game has two different endings, don’t rush the last level and make your choice.

If you get stuck in a level and can’t progress press “M”

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Collisions with slopes are really finnicky, sorry
  • The UI isn’t properly aligned sometimes (Most notably in the Gate level. The UI doesn’t appear but you can press E anyways).
